articles.author: Frances Vinall
articles.title: First same-sex marriages in Thailand set it apart from much of Asia - The Washington Post
articles.description: Weddings took place across the country, including at a Bangkok mall, as same-sex marriage became legal. Thailand is one of the few places in Asia where it’s allowed.
articles.content:
A law allowing same-sex marriagecame into effect in Thailand on Thursday, leading to an outpouring of celebration across the country.
Thailands government said a world record for the most same-sex m… [+4055 chars]
